opendial.modules

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.modules.Simulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module
    Simulator for the user/environment. The simulator generated new environment observations and user utterances based on a dialogue domain.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-01-30 22:55:33 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

        public Simulator(DialogueSystem system)
          throws DialException
        Creates a new user/environment simulator.
        Parameters:
        system - the main dialogue system to which the simulator should connect
        Throws:
        DialException - if the simulator could not be created

         Domain domain)

        Parameters:
        system - the main dialogue system to which the simulator should connect
        domain - the dialogue domain for the simulator
        Throws:
        DialException - if the simulator could not be created
